articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Dale Steyn Retirement: Dale Steyn announces retirement from all forms of cricket | Cricket News - Times of India
articles.description: Cricket News: One of the greatest pacers to have played the game of cricket, Dale Steyn, on Tuesday announced his retirement from all forms of cricket.

articles.author: hindustantimes.com
articles.title: 'Important for Virat Kohli to score big hundred': Salman Butt says 'India have to pull up their socks' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: After an emphatic 151 run win at Lord's in the 2nd Test, Virat Kohli-led Indian team lost the third Test at Headingley by an innings and 76 runs. | Cricket
articles.content: Former Pakistan captain Salman Butt believes Indian batsmen Virat Kohli, Cheteshwar Pujara and Ajinkya Rahane must play big knocks for India to get back in a positive mindset in the Test series again… [+1733 chars]
